Query:
SELECT DATA.Id as Id, CASE WHEN DATA.ItemType = 'E' THEN 'Equipo ' + DATA.Description WHEN DATA.ItemType = 'ECDI' THEN 'Calibración interna
Equipo ' + DATA.Description WHEN DATA.ItemType = 'ECDE' THEN 'Calibración externa
Equipo ' + DATA.Description WHEN DATA.ItemType = 'EVDI' THEN 'Verificación interna
Equipo ' + DATA.Description WHEN DATA.ItemType = 'EVDE' THEN 'Verificación externa
Equipo ' + DATA.Description END AS Description FROM ( select E.Id AS Id, E.Description AS Description, E.Id AS ItemId, 'E' AS ItemType, EMP.Id AS EmployeeId, ISNULL(EMP.Name,'') AS EmployeeName, ISNULL(EMP.LastName,'') AS EmployeeLastName FROM Equipment E WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Employee EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.Id = E.Resposable AND EMP.Active = 0 WHERE E.Active = 1 AND E.CompanyId = #CompanyId# UNION select ECD.EquipmentId AS Id, E.Description AS Description, ECD.Id AS ItemId, 'ECD' + CASE WHEN ECD.Type = 0 THEN 'I' ELSE 'E' END AS ItemType, EMP.Id AS EmployeeId, ISNULL(EMP.Name,'') AS EmployeeName, ISNULL(EMP.LastName,'') AS EmployeeLastName FROM EquipmentCalibrationDefinition ECD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Employee EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.Id = ECD.Responsable INNER JOIN Equipment E WITH(NOLOCK) ON E.Id = ECD.EquipmentId AND E.Active = 1 AND EMP.Active = 0 WHERE ECD.Active = 1 AND ECD.CompanyId = #CompanyId# UNION select EVD.EquipmentId AS Id, E.Description AS Description, EVD.Id AS ItemId, 'EVD' + CASE WHEN EVD.VerificationType = 0 THEN 'I' ELSE 'E' END AS ItemType, EMP.Id AS EmployeeId, ISNULL(EMP.Name,'') AS EmployeeName, ISNULL(EMP.LastName,'') AS EmployeeLastName FROM EquipmentVerificationDefinition EVD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Employee EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.Id = EVD.Responsable INNER JOIN Equipment E WITH(NOLOCK) ON E.Id = EVD.EquipmentId AND E.Active = 1 AND EMP.Active = 0 WHERE EVD.Active = 1 AND EVD.CompanyId = #CompanyId# ) AS DATA
